Package com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.preview.listener

Interface DynamicPreview<T extends Preview<?,?>,D,S>

Type Parameters:
T - The type of the preview.
D - The type of the preview data.
S - The type of the preview size.
All Known Implementing Classes:
DynamicPreviewActivity
public interface DynamicPreview<T extends Preview<?,?>,D,S>
An interface to implement a dynamic Preview.

    • getFileName

      @NonNull String getFileName(int requestCode, boolean legacy)
      This method will be called to get the default file name.
      Parameters:
      requestCode - The request code used by the intent.
      legacy - true if requesting for the legacy storage.
      Returns:
      The file name for the preview.

    • onExportComplete

      void onExportComplete(@Nullable Uri file)
      This method will be called after exporting the preview.
      Parameters:
      file - The URI for the exported file.

      This method will be called when there is an error while exporting the preview.
